channel.title: Delta 317 item massing
channel.description: Yes it's 2014 and we're using a delta, dont tell me to use a different base just help me fix this problem please. Well here's the problem, when you use range and switch to a melee weapon then eat, then switch back to melee weapon, it masses hits. Can someone tell me how to fix this i'm not sure which files to use to fix this probably client.java but please lmk what file you need me to show and ill post it.

item.title: Delta 317 item massing
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

I’d suggest reading through this tutorial and learning about delays. Alternatively you can replicate a combat system from a more improved source or start from scratch.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta 317 item massing
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

delta has garbage combat. this isn’t the only problem you’re going to find.

the problem with delta’s combat is not really one section of it, but just the way it was built up and designed

item.title: Delta 317 item massing
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“joeyscape, post:7, topic:538058”]if(!UseBow && !UseCrossBow && !UseRing) { if (GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 3) == true) { inCombat = true; lastCombat = System.currentTimeMillis(); if(EntangleDelay > 0 && !GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1)) { return false; }

I think it’s that 1.[/quote]hence you already have a lastcombat variable add a check so it need to wait like 1000millis before next hit? or whatever u want.
Its not how it should be done anyways, you should go ahead and try to rewrite it

Read full topic

item.title: Delta 317 item massing
item.dc:creator: @joeyscape joeyscape
item.description:
@joeyscape wrote:

if(!UseBow && !UseCrossBow && !UseRing) { if (GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 3) == true) { inCombat = true; lastCombat = System.currentTimeMillis(); if(EntangleDelay > 0 && !GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1)) { return false; }

I think it’s that 1.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta 317 item massing
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“joeyscape, post:5, topic:538058”][code]
if(!UseBow && !UseCrossBow && !UseRing) {

if(GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 3) == false){
faceNPC(32768 + AttackingOn);
followID = AttackingOn2.playerId;
return false;
} else {
faceNPC(32768 + AttackingOn);
followID = AttackingOn2.playerId;
}

}[/code] like where can i add and how can i add a delay timer for range to hit after eating or potting because everytime you eat instantly hits again.[/quote]Well thats only making you face the npc and follow him, not dealing damage, from what is see.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta 317 item massing
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

I don’t mind you using delta even though it does have a lot of bad code that you are going to have to clean up when you can get a much cleaner source so you don’t have to waste that time cleaning the whole server up but delta probably has the worst combat programmed in it then other private servers. Even if you do manage to fix this problem, there is probably a million different problems still there that you will encounter further. If I was you I would either re-write the combat or try doing your best of ripping it from another source.

Good luck

Read full topic
